chapters.title: Chapter 27: A Call to Stand
chapters.info: Raechin Connoral, p. 429—Aes Sedai of the Red Ajah. She is Viria's sister. They are the only siblings left in the Tower, now that Adeleas and Vandene are dead. She and her sister have been named Sitters, replacing Javindhra and Pevara. She is tall, and has dark hair that she keeps in a coil of braids at the top.
